text: Antonio Dorado Soto (June 18, 1931 - March 17, 2015) was a Spanish Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1956, Dorado Soto was named bishop of Guadix in 1970. He was then named bishop of Cádiz Y Ceuta in 1973 and finally bishop of Málaga in 1993. He retired in 2008.Antonio Dorado Soto ==Notes== Category:1931 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Bishops of Málaga
title: Antonio Dorado Soto
